name: TypeScript Strict Mode Tracking
description: Tracks TypeScript strict mode adoption across all TS repos. Analyzes tsconfig.json settings, counts type errors in strict mode, and tracks migration progress over time.
process: Resolve github-token via juggler_resolve_composite for GitHub API access
For each target repo: fetch tsconfig.json via GitHub API
Analyze strict mode flags (strict, noImplicitAny, strictNullChecks, strictFunctionTypes, strictBindCallApply, strictPropertyInitialization, noImplicitThis, alwaysStrict)
Categorize repos by strictness level: full (strict: true), partial (some flags), none (no strict flags)
Compare with previous run stored in Setec to track migration progress over time

metrics.successCriteria: All TS repos analyzed, strict mode status tracked
